name: Duck N' Ballin'
description:
Help the CS50 staff fend off the rubber duckies that started to fly around the classroom!

***

A 2D retro-themed game inspired by the game 'Duck Hunt' but with CS50 references and it is made by a comtech student.

This is my final project for CS50's Introduction to Computer Science course. Don't know what that is? If you are interested in learning computer science, check the link provided: https://www.edx.org/course/cs50s-introduction-to-computer-science

Controls: Move mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

And yes, the game might come with some bugs, so I apologize.

But I just wanna tell you, if you are an aspiring developer who's already in the verge of giving up, this is one proof that you can finish your game. You just have to be persistent and passionate.

We are still learning, but all should be willing to improve. I'll get there, we'll get there.

This is one of the things the course had taught me. Thank you, CS50 (special thanks to Sir David J. Malan).

***

If you want or able to support me, you can by giving a little donation by clicking the button below the game screen or you can simply share the game to friends and be inspired by this journey.

And now, I'll end this here, by saying... this was my CS50x journey.
